0.text: Innate: Periodically, after casting an ability, Gragas  heals himself for  6.5% of his maximum health.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, after casting an ability, Gragas heals himself for  6.5% of his maximum health.
markedPassages: heals
6.5% of his maximum health
6.5% of his maximum health

0.text: Active: Gragas rolls a cask to the target location, remaining there for 4 seconds, granting  sight of the area, and fermenting over 2 seconds to increase its  damage and  slow effectiveness, up to a maximum of 150%. Barrel Roll can be recast at any time within its duration after the cask has fully travelled, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
0.html: Active: Gragas rolls a cask to the target location, remaining there for 4 seconds, granting sight of the area, and fermenting over 2 seconds to increase its damage and slow effectiveness, up to a maximum of 150%. Barrel Roll can be recast at any time within its duration after the cask has fully travelled, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
markedPassages: sight
slow

1.text: Recast: Gragas detonates the cask, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, reduced by 30% against  minions, and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
1.html: Recast: Gragas detonates the cask, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, reduced by 30% against minions, and slowing them for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: minions
slowing

0.text: Active: Gragas  channels for 0.75 seconds, drinking out of his brew, and gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Gragas channels for 0.75 seconds, drinking out of his brew, and gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: channels

1.text: Upon completing the channel, Gragas empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus magic damage to the target and nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters.
1.html: Upon completing the channel, Gragas empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus magic damage to the target and nearby enemies, capped at 300 against monsters.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
50 bonus range
monsters

0.text: Active: Gragas  charges in the target direction and stops upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies,  knocking them back, though not through terrain, and  stunning them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Gragas charges in the target direction and stops upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies, knocking them back, though not through terrain, and stunning them for 1 second.
markedPassages: charges
knocking them back
stunning

1.text: Body Slam's  current cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if Gragas hits an enemy.
1.html: Body Slam's  current cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if Gragas hits an enemy.
markedPassages: current cooldown

2.text: Barrel Roll and  Explosive Cask can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Barrel Roll and Explosive Cask can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Barrel Roll
Explosive Cask
possibleConcerningAbilities: Barrel Roll and  Explosive Cask can be cast during the dash.

Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SOULREND: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).

Active
